welcome.text: I'm a Chatbot that can make easier your searches in the Web. What are you looking for?

entity.text: There is nothing matching "@slot". Here are some examples you can get

target.text: Looking for things matching "@entity". What type of things are you interested in?

source.text: Looking for "@target" matching "@entity". Should I look into some place in particular?

Amazon.text: I found @slot results from "@source". I will show you the first results.

MercadoLibre.text: I found @slot results from "@source". I will show you the first results.

E-commerce.text: I found @slot results from all "@source". I will show you the first results.
